item.description:
Chanting in Bliss: The Taoist Healing Sounds

Join Erik Harris for a Taoist Qi Qong workshop. While chanting the Taoist healing sounds, we will attain balance & bliss for our bodies and minds.

Healing Sounds Qi Qong practice is one of the most well-known of the thousands of forms of Taoist qigong. We use this qigong practice to transform "stuck" emotional energy into nourishment for the five organ-systems described by Asian Medicine.

In Taoist qigong practice, the emotions are understood as simply forms of energy. Chanting the healing sounds can break up a particular emotion, so that the energy can once again flow freely.

7 pm
Cost is $10 per person.
Growing Green Wellness Center
item.name: The Taoist Healing Sounds
